event.description: Omar Infante singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Yunel Escobar flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Chipper Jones hits a ground-rule double (4) on a fly ball to right-center field. Omar Infante to 3rd.
Garret Anderson grounds out, first baseman Jorge Cantu to pitcher Graham Taylor. Omar Infante scores. Chipper Jones to 3rd.
Martin Prado flies out to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Jeff Francoeur singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
David Ross singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida. Jeff Francoeur to 2nd.
Jordan Schafer called out on strikes.
Derek Lowe hits a sacrifice bunt. Fielding error by third baseman Emilio Bonifacio. Jeff Francoeur to 3rd. David Ross to 2nd. Derek Lowe to 1st.
Omar Infante out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Cameron Maybin. Jeff Francoeur scores.
Yunel Escobar singles on a line drive to center fielder Cameron Maybin, deflected by shortstop Hanley Ramirez. David Ross scores. Derek Lowe to 2nd.
Chipper Jones walks. Derek Lowe to 3rd. Yunel Escobar to 2nd.
